greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n, k) = 3*T(n-1, k-1) + T(n-1, k) for k<n and T(n, n) = 1, T(n, k) = 0, if k<0 or k>n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..100 of triangle, flattened
formula: T(n,k) = R(n,k,3) where R(n,k,m) = (1-m)^(-n+k)-m^(k+1)*pochhammer(n-k, k+1)* hyper2F1([1,n+1],[k+2],m)/(k+1)!. - _Peter Luschny_, Jul 25 2014
program: for(n=0,12, for(k=0,n, print1(T(n,k), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
if k lt 0 or k gt n then return 0;
elif k eq n then return 1;
[T(n,k): k in [0..n], n in [0..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
[[T(n, k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 18 2019
results.author: _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 11 2006
ext: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 19 2006
